column4: Ok guys i have a serious problem. I was trying to resize my hardrive in gparted. It did not complete the task and now the filesystem is damaged and read as unformatted. I have 10 years of writing on that drive please someone smarter than me be out there.
is there anything i can do?
Does anyone know a channel where someone would be knowledgeable about this?
you tried to resize a partition that contained 10 years of writing that you don't have backed up?
